features: [ GENTLE CLEANSER ] Gentle face wash formulated with hyaluronic acid, ceramides, squalane & triglycerides. This gentle face cleanser removes makeup, dirt, and excess oil without stripping moisture for a non-greasy feel & long-lasting hydration.

[ FOAMING OIL FACE CLEANSER ] This hydrating cleanser transforms from an oil into a soft lathering foaming cleanser, that hydrates and leaves skin feeling comfortable without a tight, dry skin feeling.

[ CLEANSER FOR DRY SKIN ] National Eczema Association accepted. Suitable for use as an eczema body wash. Suitable for sensitive skin, atopic-prone skin, and baby skin. Fragrance-free & non-comedogenic.

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products, formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II), help maintain the skin’s natural barrier.
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and offers products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.
body.description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser is formulated for dry to very dry skin. Also suitable for sensitive skin, atopic-prone skin, and baby skin. This hydrating cleanser can be used as both an eczema face wash and eczema body wash. Non-comedogenic. Fragrance-free. Containing 3 essential ceramides 1, 3, 6-II, this foaming face wash formula helps maintain the skin’s natural barrier, ensuring it does not feel tight. Keeps skin hydrated. Suitable for use on Face and Body. National Eczema Association accepted. • Fragrance-free• Non-comedogenic• No greasy residue, residue-free• Gentle cleanses• Gynecologist tested• Suitable for normal to very dry skin• Suitable for all ages starting from 3+ month• Removes make-upKey Ingredients:• 3 Essential Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help maintain the skin’s natural barrier• Squalane Oil: known to help retain moisture - the formula maintains the skin barrier and keeps skin comfortable without feeling greasy.• Hyaluronic Acid: Helps retain skin’s natural moisture

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gentle Hydrating Oil to Foam Cleanser​ CeraVe Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser gently cleanses and removes makeup, dirt & excess oil without leaving skin feeling tight or dry.​ It helps skin keep hydrating and maintains skin’s natural barrier.​ This foaming oil cleanser transforms from an oil into a soft lathering foam.​ ​ ​ How to Use Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage a dime-size amount of Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser into skin in a gentle circular motion. Rinse.​ ​Follow by your favorite CeraVe’s moisturizer.​ Suitable for use on the face, body, even hands.​ Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse thoroughly with water. Developed with Dermatologists​ All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists.​ Hydrating Foaming Oil Cleanser is formulated without fragrance. It is non-comedogenic and suitable for dry to very dry skin including sensitive skin, atopic-prone skin, and baby skin (3+ months). Squalane Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, and Ceramides​ Squalane Oil is known to help retain moisture – the formula maintains the skin barrier and keeps skin comfortable without feeling greasy.​ Hyaluronic Acid helps retain skin’s natural moisture.​ Ceramides are naturally found in your skin and play a vital role in helping your skin protect you. They help fill in the gaps between your skin cells so your skin can seal in moisture and seal out impurities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Favorite Cerave Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many Cerave cleansers at different stages of my skincare journey. All have been excellent for various needs. This one is THE BEST for dry skin. Winter weather plus retinoids have made my skin parched and flaky. Starting my day with a cleanser that leaves a dry, "tight" feeling strips all of the moisture I pump into my skin overnight right out. This cleanser eliminates that issue and is gentle and moisturizing. It has a pleasing, silky skin feel and has not caused any breakouts or sensitivity issues. Switching to this cleanser and following it up with a layer of blue tansy oil from the Yellow Bird (also available on amazon) has actually eliminated dry patches on my skin and restored a healthy glow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CLEAN SKIN, NO STRIPPING!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry, sensitive skin and this oil cleanser leaves my face, neck and decolletage clean, soft and moisturized. It makes a pleasant, light, bubbly lather and is fragrance-free (a must for me). It's a great value since the price point is very affordable and it only takes one pump for me to clean the areas I mentioned above. I'm happy with my purchase and will repurchase it as needed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The item arrived damaged with the pump nozzle broken off but I am still able to use it so I deducted a star. I had been wanting to try this product for some time and am a fan of the other CeraVe products (toners, cleansers, miceller water, etc.). This product wasn't *quite* as moisturizing as I was expecting (I guess the oil part made me think it would be ultra hydrating), but it did leave my skin feeling cleansed and not tight at all (a feeling I hate). It did a good job removing eye makeup and when I toned after I cleansed I didn't pick up any obvious traces of leftover foundation. Overall, my face felt nice after using this product and I will continue to use it. I would recommend this item 9/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using this face wash 2 times a day once in the morning and once before bed for a year its helped so much! Makes your face feel clean and hydrated and super soft! Definitely recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: Gets my face clean without drying out my skin. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it alot
reviews.reviewText: I would absolutely recommend this to anyone. It feels good. Even my husband uses it and like the feeling of it. Tastes terrible if you actually get it on your lips. Lol. Seriously this is a good wash. Doesn't over dry. If fact my face feels better when I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Product for My Dry Skin
reviews.reviewText: I'm in the 60+ age group & have very dry skin; this is the best shower cleanser I've ever tried! It leaves my skin feeling clean, refreshed, & not tight or dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I saw some European vloggers show this product, and hoped it would work well as a first oil cleanser for me. My skin is not dry, but reactive and dehydrated, so a gentle non-stripping cleanser is a must, otherwise my skin freaks out and makes more oil. I feel like Cera Ve tried to be trendy and deliver a KBeauty inspired product for the European and North American market, but delivered a weird hybrid instead. This product is a thick and dense clear yellow gel cleanser, which was formulated to resemble oil in its consistency. It's not an oil and doesn't clean like one. It needs to be applied to wet skin and foams into creamy leather. It feels nice and is pleasant to use, doesn't sting the eyes or strip my skin. Unfortunately it's not not very effective at either dissolving or removing skin oil, make up, sunscreen, or mascara. Frustratingly, it leaves a fair amount of dirt and make up behind. I needed a second cleanser after using this one, and my skin and eyes still didn't feel as clean as when I use oil cleanser followed by a second cleanser. It might work well for someone with dry skin in the mornings, to clean the skin without stripping, but it's not great for people who use sunscreen, especially physical sunscreens or make up which is made to be water-resistant. Another issue I have with this product is the pump, which dispenses a huge amount of gel. I purchased a large bottle, and am amazed to say that after several days of use I see a considerable amount of product gone. It's not a very good value for the money.
